attributes.description:
This visualization displays the total count of instances where unauthorized modification attempts were made on plan documents.

**Why this visualization works:**
It provides a quick, high-level understanding of the overall unauthorized activity directed at critical plans. A non-zero count here immediately flags a potential compliance issue or a security incident that requires investigation.

**How an analyst can use it:**
Use this metric in conjunction with the trend visualization to understand if a high number of unauthorized attempts is a recent spike or a persistent issue. This visualization acts as a quick health check for the modification controls on your plan documents. A continuously high count suggests a need for deeper investigation into why unauthorized users or processes are attempting to modify these files.

kibanaSavedObjectMeta.searchSourceJSON: {"query":{"language":"kuery","query":"(file.path:(\"*\\plans\\*\" OR \"*\\documents\\*\" OR \"*.plan\" OR \"*.conf\" OR \"*.xml\" OR \"*.yml\" OR \"*.ini\") OR file.extension:(\"plan\" OR \"conf\" OR \"xml\" OR \"yml\" OR \"ini\")) AND event.type:(\"change\" OR \"modification\" OR \"deletion\" OR \"renaming\" OR \"permission_change\") AND NOT (user.name:(*system* OR *administrator* OR \"NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM\" OR *authorized_admin*) AND event.outcome:success)"},"filter":[],"indexRefName":"kibanaSavedObjectMeta.searchSourceJSON.index"}

attributes.title: [PL-2, CCI-003064] Total Unauthorized Plan Modifications
attributes.visState: {"title":"[PL-2, CCI-003064] Total Unauthorized Plan Modifications","type":"metric","aggs":[{"id":"1","enabled":true,"type":"count","params":{"customLabel":"Total Unauthorized Modifications","emptyAsNull":false},"schema":"metric"}],"params":{"addTooltip":true,"fontSize":"60","addLegend":false,"type":"metric","metric":{"percentageMode":false,"useRanges":false,"colorSchema":"Green to Red","metricColorMode":"None","colorsRange":[{"from":0,"to":10000}],"labels":{"show":true},"invertColors":false,"style":{"bgFill":"#000","bgColor":false,"labelColor":false,"subText":"","fontSize":60}}}}

attributes.description:
This table provides a detailed breakdown of individual anomalies detected by the ML job for unauthorized plan modifications. It lists the specific events that were flagged as unusual.

**Why and when this visualization works:**
This view is essential for investigating the specifics of a modification anomaly. When the trend chart shows a spike, this table provides the necessary context to determine the event's legitimacy. Understanding which user, process, and host were involved is key to verifying compliance.

**How an analyst can use it:**
Filter the time range to focus on a specific anomaly. Sort by 'anomaly_score' to see the most critical events first. Review the influencer fields ('influencers.user.name', 'influencers.process.name', 'influencers.file.path') to determine the source of the modification. Cross-reference this information with change management records to confirm if the activity was authorized. Unexplained anomalies must be investigated as potential security incidents.
attributes.title: [PL-2, CCI-003064] ML - Detailed Plan Modification Anomalies

attributes.description:
This table provides a detailed breakdown of individual events related to unauthorized modifications of critical plan documents.

**Why this visualization works:**
It offers granular detail on each event, including the user, process, and file involved, and the specific action attempted (e.g., modification, deletion, permission change). This level of detail is crucial for in-depth investigation and pinpointing exact policy violations and security incidents.

**How an analyst can use it:**
Sort by 'user.name' or 'process.name' to identify common sources of unauthorized activity. Examine 'file.path' to pinpoint specific plan documents being targeted. The 'event.action' field will show precisely what action was attempted. This table is critical for understanding the 'who, what, and where' of potential plan integrity failures and is essential for any resulting investigation.

kibanaSavedObjectMeta.searchSourceJSON: {"query":{"language":"kuery","query":"(file.path:(\"*\\plans\\*\" OR \"*\\documents\\*\" OR \"*.plan\" OR \"*.conf\" OR \"*.xml\" OR \"*.yml\" OR \"*.ini\") OR file.extension:(\"plan\" OR \"conf\" OR \"xml\" OR \"yml\" OR \"ini\")) AND event.type:(\"change\" OR \"modification\" OR \"deletion\" OR \"renaming\" OR \"permission_change\") AND NOT (user.name:(*system* OR *administrator* OR \"NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM\" OR *authorized_admin*) AND event.outcome:success)"},"filter":[],"indexRefName":"kibanaSavedObjectMeta.searchSourceJSON.index"}

attributes.title: [PL-2, CCI-003064] Detailed Unauthorized Plan Modification Events

attributes.description: This section provides visualizations to help you assess compliance with CCI-003064, focusing on protecting critical plans from unauthorized modification. You'll find visualizations designed to highlight any attempts to alter plan documents, configurations, or permissions. To perform a component-level compliance assessment, utilize the global filters at the top of the Kibana dashboard. Apply filters like 'host.name: <your_component_name>' to focus on a specific system. Observe the trends and individual events in the visualizations for any anomalies or unauthorized changes. Any modification event not performed by an explicitly authorized user or process should be investigated thoroughly, as this control is critical for maintaining the integrity of operational and strategic plans.
attributes.title: [PL-2, CCI-003064] Protect Plans from Unauthorized Modification
attributes.visState: {"title":"[PL-2, CCI-003064] Protect Plans from Unauthorized Modification","type":"markdown","aggs":[],"params":{"markdown":"# [PL-2, CCI-003064] Protect Plans from Unauthorized Modification\n\n### This control focuses on leveraging File Integrity Monitoring (FIM) to protect critical plan documents from unauthorized modification, ensuring their integrity and availability. Use these visualizations to monitor for and investigate any unauthorized changes.","fontSize":12,"openLinksInNewTab":false}}

attributes.description: This visualization displays the health status for CCI-003064 based on anomaly scores from the associated ML job. It helps assess compliance with PL-2 by highlighting unusual patterns in unauthorized modification attempts on critical plan documents. A high anomaly score warrants immediate investigation.
attributes.title: [PL-2, CCI-003064] Protect Plans from Unauthorized Modification ML

attributes.description:
This visualization displays a time-series trend of attempts to modify critical plan documents.

**Why this visualization works:**
It provides a quick visual of spikes or consistent attempts to modify plans over time, which can indicate an ongoing attack, a misconfiguration, or a policy violation. Identifying these trends allows for proactive intervention and helps assess the effectiveness of your integrity controls.

**How an analyst can use it:**
Look for sudden increases in modification events or a consistently high baseline. Hover over data points to see the exact count at a given time. Use the time range selector to narrow down suspicious periods. This helps you understand if your plan protection mechanisms are being consistently challenged. Pay close attention to events where 'user.name' is not an authorized administrator or service account.

query.query: (file.path:("*\plans\*" OR "*\documents\*" OR "*.plan" OR "*.conf" OR "*.xml" OR "*.yml" OR "*.ini") OR file.extension:("plan" OR "conf" OR "xml" OR "yml" OR "ini")) AND event.type:("change" OR "modification" OR "deletion" OR "renaming" OR "permission_change") AND NOT (user.name:(*system* OR *administrator* OR "NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM" OR *authorized_admin*) AND event.outcome:success)

attributes.title: [PL-2, CCI-003064] Unauthorized Plan Modification Trend (converted)
